channel.title: Server problem, it's possible to be fixed but i don't know how
channel.description: So I'm using the demolishscape v9 server and client, I tried using the Silab Client and it immediately logged me out. The server has something in it to prevent me from logging in to any other client other than the demolishscape client, how do I fix this?

item.title: Server problem, it's possible to be fixed but i don't know how
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

Vusta:

I don’t think you can fix it. If it doesn’t work it doesn’t work. Try to find a client compatible with the server.

^^ Fail

You can fix it, remove the uid from your server

Read full topic
